name.japanese: エニエス・ロビー - 司法の塔

description: The Tower of Justice at Enies Lobby, where Nico Robin is held captive by CP9 and Spandam. This is where the confrontation between Robin, Spandam, and CP9 takes place.

keyEvents.title: CP9 Reveals Plan to Execute Straw Hats
keyEvents.description: Rob Lucci reveals the loophole in the agreement that allows CP9 to kill the Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Robin learns her sacrifice was meaningless.

keyEvents.title: Rob Lucci Reveals His Bloodlust
keyEvents.description: Lucci reveals his true psychopathic nature to Spandam in the Tower of Justice.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the Tower as a place of dark revelations.

keyEvents.title: Spandam Beats Robin
keyEvents.description: Spandam violently beats Robin for questioning his authority.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the cruelty that takes place within the World Government's stronghold.

name.japanese: エニエス・ロビー - 裁判所

description: The Courthouse of Justice at Enies Lobby, where Luffy battles Marines and encounters Blueno on the rooftop.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Fights Through Marines
keyEvents.description: Luffy battles waves of Marines on and around the courthouse.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Luffy's determination to reach Robin.

keyEvents.title: Blueno Confronts Luffy
keyEvents.description: Blueno waits for Luffy on the courthouse roof and confronts him.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the crucial rematch between Luffy and Blueno.

description: The Judicial Island of the World Government, a fortified stronghold where the Straw Hats launch their assault to rescue Robin.

keyEvents.title: Sodom and Gomorrah's Story
keyEvents.description: Chopper translates the King Bulls' backstory as they travel through Enies Lobby.
keyEvents.significance: Provides character development during the assault.

keyEvents.title: Sogeking Goes Missing
keyEvents.description: The group realizes Sogeking has separated from them.

description: The island in West Blue that was destroyed by a Buster Call 20 years before the current story. Home to archaeologists studying the Void Century.

keyEvents.title: Brief Ohara Flashback
keyEvents.description: Robin has a brief flashback to Ohara when reminded of the Buster Call.
keyEvents.significance: Foreshadows the full Ohara flashback arc to come.

statusHistory.reason: Destroyed by Buster Call 20 years before the main story
